CustomField.formula: IF(National_Grant_Type__c = 'OVC', 'OVC_LOA.pdf', IF(FirstPic_National_Org_Code__c = 'NCAI', 'TRAIL_LOA.pdf', IF(ST_Mississippi_Dept_of_Human_Services__c > 0, 'Ripken_Mississippi_Funder_LOA.pdf', IF(ISPICKVAL(Grant_Type__c, 'Special Initiative'), 'Ripken_Special_Initiative_LOA.pdf', IF(ISPICKVAL(Grant_Type__c, 'Badges for Baseball'), 'Ripken_Badges_for_Baseball_LOA.pdf', IF(ISPICKVAL(Grant_Type__c, 'Healthy Lifestyles'), 'Ripken_Healthy_Lifestyles_LOA.pdf', 'Ripken_Im_GREAT_LOA.pdf'))))))
CustomField.label: LOA
